about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Mother's Day 2020] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Yellow Cloth
  • Butterfly Open
  • Bear Figures
  • Floral Door Decor
  • Green Bottles
  • Cuckoo Clock
  • Yellow Floral Wall
  • Alicante's Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
